As far as I know, she's never caused any permanent damage or death to any of her toys. Not even on accident! Most of her games are also quite enjoyable. My personal favorite is hide-and-seek..."

Another shrunken man then began speaking.

"We were all quite scared about the idea of becoming Miss Naoko's toys at first, but most of us have come to enjoy it! She always keeps us well fed, and she even brought home one of the massive hotels from that toy city for us to sleep in! It's actually very detailed in there, and the beds are unbelievably comfy."

Now you were starting to feel at ease. Naoko had seemed to be nice, but you just couldn't be completely sure. Hearing it from these people assured you that she meant you no harm. Maybe this new life would be enjoyable after all.

"I just have one more question. Why do you keep calling her Miss Naoko? She seems to want you to just call her Naoko..."

This time a young boy answered you.

"Because she's just so nice! We all really respect her! I doubt many other people would care about us the way she does..."

"So you all really enjoy being her toys?"

A young girl answers you this time.

"Yeah! It's really fun to play with Miss Naoko! She's a really fun person!"

Hearing all of this had finally put your mind at ease. Based on what these people said, Naoko was a good person who wouldn't try to hurt you in any way. You felt lucky that if this had to happen to you, that it was at least with someone that would be enjoyable to live with. Just then, Naoko re-entered the room.

"Okay Steve, have you gotten to know the rest of the toys?"

"Yes Naoko. I hope that we can get along together."

"Well that's good. Now follow me..."
11511111.title: The enjoyable life of a toy...

choices: You bow thanking Naoko again and she blushs.
115111111.content: "We're gonna play a game now!" Naoko said. The little girl who answered you earlier came back up to you, "What she mean by game?" You ask. "You a game like 'hide and seek' or 'tag' but we toys only play that one because Miss Naoko would be really hard to catch." The Little girl said. "Oh." You say with a sheepish laugh. Naoko then picked up everyone and set them on the desk in her room, she then brought over the little toy hotel that all the toys sleep in. "Today, you guys are gonna play 'haunted!'" Naoko said. "Uh Miss Naoko, we haven't played that game before, can you establish the rules?" A Boy your age asked. "Okay, how this game works is that all of you except 2 get covered up completely with small sheets with holes for the eyes, and then 2 of you won't get covered but get small vacuum cleaners. The objective is for all the 'ghosts to run around the hotel and the people who don't get covered have to come and find you like ghost hunters. If one of they 2 suck your sheet into their small vacuum, you're out and you have to come out and wait with me." Naoko said. "Sounds like a cool, well thought out game" You say thinking out loud. "Aw, thanks Steve!" Naoko said with a small blush. "Anyway who want to be ghosts?" Naoko said, everyone except you and the Boy from earlier raised their hand. "You guys don't wanna be ghosts? Then how about you 2 be the hunters?" Naoko asked with a smile on her face. You and the Boy walked over to each other and shook hands. "Hey I'm Steve." You say with a smile. "I'm Ricky!" The Boy said. "R..R..Ricky?" You stuttered. "Wait, Steve!" Ricky said. Years ago, when you and Ricky were in middle school you were the best of friends. But one day he dissapeared. Most People told you he moved away but now you know the truth. "So Naoko's friends shrunk you and then Naoko saved you from their wrath of trying to destroy you. She brought you here?" You asked your good buddy. "Yeah." Ricky said. You then walked over to Naoko and thanked her. "For What?" Naoko asked. "Saving my Best Friend from being killed years ago." You said. "Ricky is you friend?" Naoko asked. "Yeah, and then one day in middle school he dissapeared" You said. What happens next?
115111111.title: "We're going to play a game now!"

1151112.content:
"I'm just gonna catch a few more tiny people so you won't be lonely!" she said cheerfully. Then she spent a few more hours searching through the city for some more victims. You, she held in her hand as a place of honor apparently. The rest of her captives she barely spoke to and just dropped them down the back of her pants. You got a little uneasy just noting how careless she was. Naoko crushed at least five people fleeing without even noticing, and called suspicion upon on whether those in her possession really lived as long as she said the did. Your thoughts were broken up when Naoko stopped looking for more tinies and said "Okay! All done here!"
Naoko walked towards the door when a voice called from behind her "Hey Naoko! You wanna plaay a little?" called_______.
1151112.title: "Go and catch a few more toys in this littl...

choices: Crush him in her bare hands
Dump the toy in her chest with you
115112.content:
It was like a strange Twighlight Zone episode. This beautiful girl is grinning and giggling, but you are dumbfounded when she bluntly says, "I'm going to torture you a bit, and then I'll crush you like a bug under my perfectly formed feet." It was hard to believe that such an angelic looking person could be so cruel and evil.

You hope that she is kidding, but soon find out differently. She drops you down her blouse and you get trapped in between her perky boobs. Her smiling face looms overhead as the pressure from your surrounding flesh prison increases. "The more I move my arms in front of me," she tells you as she gives you a sample, "the more my awesome boobs mash together. I could easily crush you right now. Lucky for you, I want to play with you for a while and then hunt you down and crush you under my foot. Ha-ha."

Dear lord, what is going on? This simply can't be happening. Maybe it's all just a nightmare. Her tits are now constricting the air to your lungs and you can't even scream for help. She must have noticed how red your face was, because she let up a bit.

Your whole world got shaken up as she took a step and bent down, "Gotcha!" She stood back up and held out another small man above where you are trapped.

"I think I'll take this toy and..."
115112.title: "Torture you a bit, and then I'll crush...

1151121.content:
Naoko is obviously trying to scare the shit out of you before she kills you. With a gleam in her eye, she takes her sleek fingers and toyingly pinches at the poor guy's exposed manhood. He yells out in pain and pleads for her to let him go or kill him quickly. "Now how much fun would that be?" she says chuckling.

"Little Boob guy, it's time to say bye bye to little junior here." You yell out, "No, please let him go." Naoko winks at you and scrunches up her face as she squashes her toys dick and balls into a fine paste. He nearly blacks out from the pain. Then, while he is still conscious, she crushes the man's lower body between her palms. Bones can be heard snapping. The sound makes you green and sick to your stomach. Some blood drips down into her cleavage and flows toward you.

Although she is torturing a guy to death, the evil giant just smiles seductively at you the entire time. She takes the guy and puts him in the top of her cleavage. His mangled legs up toward her face and his head nearly touching your head.

You would never have guessed what she was going to do next...
She either presses the top of her boobs together killing the man above you or...
She decides to eat him and focus on you...
1151121.title: Crush him in her bare hands

choices: She punctures a hole in you, and then swallows whole
11511212.content: "Mmm, look at you! Your so delicious looking! I think you will join the guy in my stomach!"

choices: You try and find a better place to hide!
You find other people with you in the building
1152.content:
You quickly ran into a building that was made entirely out of paper. Even if this were a real building with a solid structure and all the reinforcement, it still wouldnt be enough to withstand the awesome strength of Naoko's foot crushing down on it! But for now this will do as a hiding spot.

You carefully peaked out from one of the window cut outs as several other terrified people run down the street. They all split up as the giantess stomps torwards them but some are not so lucky! Naoko bends down then picks up a fleeing man and lifts him to her face. You hear screams of terror before Naoko releases him inside her mouth and chews him to bits.

"Yum." She says and prepares to go after two more people in her path. They tried to run but there was nowhere to go. Naoko raises her giant bare foot and brings it down, crushing them like puny bugs!

"Hehe eeeww!" Naoko laughs as she wipes their remains off against the ground.

"Oh no! This is awful! I have to escape this place before she finds me." You said to yourself. As the giantess stomps around, looking for more people,
1152.title: Hiding from the goddess

choices: She rakes her teeth over your body
she kills you in some other interesting
11521.content:
Naoko's beautiful emerald eye sees you through a window. Her hand breaks through the wall to grab you.

You're screaming as she brings you up to her face. She licks her lips.
11521.title: Naoko see's you!

1153.content:
Running straight as fast as you could seemed to be the best thing to do as the giant threat came nearer. She was cute but at your size she could mean dead. You heard the footsteps pounding the fake streets you where running on but didn't dare too look back. It didn't even came to your mind that you could run into one of the buildings on the left and the right of you - the only thing you thought was running without wasting time. Getting away from thouse giant feet.

The steps behind you became slowlier. "Oh, a newbie", you heard the giant voice above you say. It seemed like her voice was everywhere around you. "You really are boring", was the sentence you heard shortly before a shadow was cast above you. You knew your life would end soon and thought about the smashed corpse you had seen minutes ago. As you look up you see the bare sole of the young women simply droping down on you.

Naoko didn't stopped her stride as the ball of her foot landed on the newcomer. She felt the body pop beneath her sole and the sticky liquids as she took her next step just like she had felt many times before. He didn't seem to had enough time to learn how to survive a little longer in his new home - well better luck next life she thought as she scanned the floor for new victims she could play with
1153.title: she steps on you

info.brief_description: Five beautiful girls who like behaving like giant monsters shrink you and kidnap you.
info.description:
Five hot girls enjoy shrinking people and putting them in a toy city they built with paper and cardboard. Then they like walking through the city, rampaging it like they were giant monsters. They often feel like stomping or eating people without any mercy.
Well, one of these heartless but beautiful girls kidnaps you and shrinks you. You're her next victim and you gotta do your best to survive!

Here are the five girls:

Lilian: caucasian, 20 years old, shoulder lenght blonde hair, brown eyes. She's the owner of the flat with the toy city in.
Lucy: caucasian, 18 years old, long black hair, hazel eyes, tan skin.
Lisa: caucasian, 18 years old, shoulder lenght brown hair, blue eyes, perfect body and perfect ass.
Julie: hispanic, 19 years old, long black hair, brown eyes, she's short but she has a perfect body.
Naoko: asian, 20 years old, shoulder lenght black hair, hazel eyes, cute face.

You also can involve more than a girl, they often like meeting each other and rampage a city in two or more.

I DON'T ALLOW:
Gay scenes and shit-related scenes. That's all. Anything else is allowed.

Have fun!
